newsitem.title: UK: Telkom at $36.25 in London at 0915 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Telkom at $36.25 in London at 0915 GMT.

text.p: PT Telkom traded at $36.25 and London at 0915 GMT on Monday. It recorded the day's low of $36.25 and the day's high of $36.25.
Its previous close on Friday $36.200. One ADS represents 20 ordinary shares -- Jakarta newsroom (Tel: 6221-3846364).
